---
title: "followup-schedule"
---

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(fxtas)
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
temp = trax_gp34_all |> 
  select(Study, `Visit Date`, `FXS ID`) |>
  arrange(`FXS ID`, `Visit Date`) |> 
  mutate(.by = `FXS ID`, 
         difftime = `Visit Date` - dplyr::lag(`Visit Date`)) |> 
  filter(difftime > 7)

```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
temp |> 
  ggplot() +
  aes(
    x = difftime
  ) + 
  geom_histogram() +
  facet_wrap(~Study) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 365, col = 'red')
```

```{r}
temp$difftime |> quantile(p = .25, na.rm = TRUE)
```
